results.definition: any place of pain and turmoil;
examples: the inferno of the engine room
when you're alone Christmas is the pits

results.definition: a very intense and uncontrolled fire
(Christianity) the abode of Satan and the forces of evil; where sinners suffer eternal punishment
examples: Hurl'd headlong...To bottomless perdition, there to dwell"- John Milton
a demon from the depths of the pit
Hell is paved with good intentions"-Dr. Johnson
